question:
Identify the vessel with the help of given information:
  1. It is a 55-foot sailing vessel constructed in India by M/s Aquarius Shipyard Pvt Ltd, Goa.
  2. It is the second sailboat of Indian Navy that was inducted into the Navy in February 2017
  3. It has a mast of 25 metres which has been custom-built by a South Africa manufacturing concern
Select the correct answer from options given below:
explanation:
All given features are of INSV Tarini. INSV Tarini:
  • is a 55-foot sailing vessel has been built in India by M/s Aquarius Shipyard Pvt Ltd, Goa
  • was inducted into the Indian Navy recently in February 2017
  • is the sister vessel of INSV Mhadei
  • has a mast of 25 meters which has been custom-built by a South Africa manufacturing concern for sailing in extreme conditions
  • carries a suite of six sails, including a main sail, head sails (Genoa and stay sails), downwind sails and storm sail
  • has Raymarine navigation suite and an array of satellite communication systems for perfect navigation anywhere in the world
